assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Millennial Precious Metal Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral properties. Its flagship projects include the Wildcat property that consists of 913 unpatented claims and 4 patented claims covering an area of approximately 17,565 acres located within the Farrell mining district in Nevada; and the Mountain View property that comprises of 282 unpatented claims covering an area of approximately 5,476 acres located within the Deephole mining district in Nevada, the United States. The company also holds interest in the Red Canyon, Ocelot, Marr, Eden, Dune, and Cerro Colorado properties. Millennial Precious Metal Corp. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada. As of May 4, 2023, Millennial Precious Metals Corp. operates as a subsidiary of Integra Resources Corp.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. David  Badham
companyOfficers.title: Director Legal & Corp. Affairs and Corp. Sec.
